昭.definition: bright; clear; manifest; to show clearly

昭和.definition: Shōwa, Japanese era name, corresponding to the reign (1925-1989) of emperor Hirohito 裕仁[Yu4 ren2]

昭平.definition: Zhaoping county in Hezhou 賀州|贺州[He4 zhou1], Guangxi

昭平縣.definition: Zhaoping county in Hezhou 賀州|贺州[He4 zhou1], Guangxi

昭披耶帕康.definition: Chao Phraya Phra Klang (Royal Finance and External Affairs Minister), the honorary title of the 18th century official of the royal court of Thailand who translated 三國演義|三国演义[San1 guo2 Yan3 yi4] (Romance of the Three Kingdoms) into Thai

昭披耶河.definition: Chao Phraya River, the main river of Thailand

昭示.definition: to declare publicly; to make clear

昭蘇.definition: Zhaosu County or Mongghulküre nahiyisi in Ili Kazakh Autonomous Prefecture 伊犁哈薩克自治州|伊犁哈萨克自治州[Yi1 li2 Ha1 sa4 ke4 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Xinjiang

昭蘇縣.definition: Zhaosu County or Mongghulküre nahiyisi in Ili Kazakh Autonomous Prefecture 伊犁哈薩克自治州|伊犁哈萨克自治州[Yi1 li2 Ha1 sa4 ke4 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Xinjiang

昭覺.definition: see 昭覺縣|昭觉县[Zhao1jue2 Xian4]

昭覺縣.definition: Zhaojue County in Liangshan Yi Autonomous Prefecture 涼山彝族自治州|凉山彝族自治州[Liang2shan1 Yi2zu2 Zi4zhi4zhou1], Sichuan

昭通市.definition: Zhaotong, prefecture-level city in Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2nan2 Sheng3]

昭陽.definition: Zhaoyang district of Zhaotong city 昭通市[Zhao1 tong1 shi4], Yunnan

昭陽區.definition: Zhaoyang district of Zhaotong city 昭通市[Zhao1 tong1 shi4], Yunnan

昭雪.definition: to exonerate; to clear (from an accusation); to rehabilitate
